div.p: M.B., F.D., F.E., M.F., W.P., N.S., R.H.S., D.S., and F.W. helped design the research, interpret results, and edit the manuscript. M.B. and F.D. led the economic modeling. F.D., F.E., and F.W. led model development. N.S. led health impact modeling. F.W. led emission and climate modeling. N.S. and M.B. prepared the manuscript.
